Compiling this website with Python

This website is compiled using a fairly simple Python script. Why? You might ask. And well, to be fair, I just felt like writing some Python. But I also wanted to just keep it simple while staying away from all the mumbo-jumbo JavaScript world for a change, since I do that every day anyway.

My website structure looks like this:

        src
            includes
            views
                posts
                    some-post.html
                other-loosey-goosey-view.html
            index.html
